page.title: 19RECREATION III
page.content:
{5.VICTORY SPORTS GROUND} This ground is used extensively for outdoor sports. In the winter it is used for football pitches and in the summer it is used as an amateur cricket ground. There are changing facilities and a club-house or pavilion depending on the season.
{6.GREYHOUND STADIUM} The old football stadium which now plays host to the area's dog-racing. It is also used as the venue for the Circus and other such entertainments when they visit the town.
{7.COURTLANDS LEISURE CENTRE This is a private club with an annual membership which anyone can join. It provides for a large variety of recreations which include squash,swimming,tennis,multi-gym etc.
